SEARCH
Package gw.api.database

Class Range<T>

java.lang.Object
gw.api.database.Range<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DBDateRange, ValueRange
public abstract class Range<T> extends Object
Represents a range of values for use with range predicates in queries.
Author:
pdalbora

    • getCommentForQuery

      public String getCommentForQuery()
      Returns a comment for embedding in a query. This is useful when there are a small number of variable length date ranges, as we want the optimizer to consider each length independently.
      Returns:
